ygData.subject: Re: Introducing Redhot (New character)
ygData.msgSnippet: Beachcomber had already left, but Cliffjumper turns to awnser, Cause, I can t leave Firedrill, and we can t just hide from it, we need to say what we feel.

Subject: Re: Introducing Redhot (New character)

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Beachcomber had already left, but Cliffjumper turns to awnser, "Cause, I
can't leave Firedrill, and we can't just hide from it, we need to say
what we feel." 

He then turned to see Firedrill step out. "Okay kid, we're going to
leave." but he becomes silenced as he sees another figuere follow him
out.
